component.notes: By default IP control will not work if device is in Standby mode. To enable this navigate to Setup-General Information-Standby Ip Control and enable that option. ====================== Change Log ================== Version: 2.0 Change: Added Set Speaker Profile 1-4 commands, keep alive on Query Power (execute on schedule every 30s) - Audiogene, 06/2022 Version: 1.0 - Initial Release

action_argument.name: VolumeValue
action_argument.note: Set the Main master volume (0 thru 50)
